amendment.description: To express the sense of Congress regarding climate change.

vote.text: Amendment SA 58, under the order of 1/21/15, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 49. Record Vote Number: 12.

action.text: Amendment SA 58 proposed by Senator Schatz to Amendment SA 2. (consideration: CR S267-268; text: CR S267) To express the sense of Congress regarding climate change.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 58, under the order of 1/21/15, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 49. Record Vote Number: 12.

Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 58, under the order of 1/21/15, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 49. Record Vote Number: 12.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 58 proposed by Senator Schatz to Amendment SA 2.
